reviews.text:
The spa is very well kept. Large rooms, quiet and clean. It's always relaxing as soon as you pass the door. 
There is a pleasant smell, the staff is friendly.

They offer a wide variety of services for women and men. Including waxing for men.
Amazing. Booked the the palms spa experience. Very professional and very clean. The balinese massage was super relieving of body pains.
Excellent awesome service very professional  service 5 star experience wish they give more advertisement must visit
Fantastic ambience, great staff! You can get some good deals on nearbuy and enjoy a couple of hours here.
Beautiful ambience and though they say 30 minutes, they actually go beyond the time mentioned and ensure a good service. They basically do their job very well. Must try

Love walking into a Starbucks and smelling the fresh coffee. This location was clean and the staff friendly. Coffee was made to order and correctly made for this picky coffee drinker lol. This spot has an area for when you are wanting to socialize or break out the computer/books and do some studying while sipping on a latte. Only problem I seen was the drive through and parking area are very tight but couldn't take a star away just for that. Keep it up at this location cause my little girl and I will definitely be back for our coffee.
Always fast, friendly, and informative! Their coffee is great and their snacks are always yummy! Mobile pickup through their app is always very convenient as well!

Yummy but prices need to stop going up, they  are beyond being a very successful business that has millions of people addicted and stopping for ine of their many yummy beverages and foods almost every day like its crack, stop being greedy with the cost increase of everything, PLEASE. I want to be able to afford my coffee "crack" lol just playing, kinda. Attention there's no illegal drugs served at any Starbucks facility
... that I'm aware of!
Very friendly service. Got the order correct. Fast.
Rude, impersonal staff, slow service, dirty restrooms. The food is blah, you get better quality food at much lower prices at McDonalds or any of the other fast food chains in the area.

Really friendly and delicious Vietnamese restaurant in Chinatown and next to the Courthouse.  Can't go wrong with the soups on a cold day or a heading bowl of bun on a regular day.  Service is amazingly fast and friendly.  Good is simply delicious.
Food was very good, pricing was okay. Service was very fast, instantly waited on. All the food ordered arrived in about 4 minutes.
This is the only place I go for Pho. Their pork chop over rice is also awesome. Highly recommend.

Brilliant If you want a basic pho with a lot of flavours in it. 
Seating is pretty basic but it works for the setting. 
Staff is friendly and the food is fresh. Oh and it’s dirt cheap :)

Food here is really really good authentic and fresh, and service is attentive. Ordered the crepe which was huge, and so so good. Combo vermicelli was so good, with crispy egg rolls and BBQ pork. The banh khot (?) little cupcakes filled with shrimp and green onion and coconut flavor was great too. Price is on the high end for Vietnamese food, therefore minus a star. Will return tho, for the good food!

I liked their food. It was a big serving size and tasty. They have halal meat so that is great! 

Although it was 'Geneva pricing' i.e. €20 for a meal. Coming from London, I'd not pay more than £10 for a similar meal. But it's Switzerland so you pay double.
Again, an amazing experience. Out of this world tasting food, authentic Turkish cuisine and the wait staff is helpful beyond description. A place worth going to, over and over and over.
Nice place to eat out. Their chicKen and rice is fantastic
Good service. This place is halal with certificates on the wall but do serve alcohol. Food was ok, nothing to shout about but prices were expensive, 10 Euros for a kebab sandwich!
Very tasty and good price.

Things I like: 
1.   Warm towels to clean my hands before/after dinner 
2.   When you order a feast (good for sharing), you get refills on bread/veggies 
3.  The people (VERY friendly) 
4.  Super fast!  
5.  Lunch prices are VERY reasonable. 

Other thoughts: 
The bread is so-so.   I’ve had better at other places.    Everything in our veg feast was refillable except for the collard greens.  The greens are so yummy...it’s a bummer those can’t be refilled.

I showed up with 3 friends at about 6:45. We were seated quickly, and the server even let us pick the table to sit at. The restaurant was comfortable temperature, with good lighting, and the chairs were also good.

The water at the table was cold and refreshing. I also ordered a tea-cognac which tasted good. The drink was served warm in a glass - the drink certainly tasted good, but I had to let it cool off a bit before I could comfortably lift the hot glass. My group ordered the Ethiopian feast which is basically an all-you-can-eat with each of the entrees. All the entrees were quite good, with reasonable spice levels. Our bread and water was refilled regularly, and the entrees dish
 was also refilled.

The staff was friendly throughout and I had a good time here.

Great place to have a more adventurous meal. We always get the feast, and enjoy the Ethiopian tea and coffee. I'm not a fan of honey wine but theirs is a nice option. We visited again tonight and enjoyed live music with our dinner. The hot hand towels were especially nice on a cold night!

I would give BN 5 stars without hesitation, but I can’t help but feel so wasteful when I get the vegetarian feast and they refill it so generously, but I can’t take what’s leftover. The tea is amazing. Amazing. Go for the tea, at least.
I went with three other people and ordered the vegetarian platter.  We just love our favorite dish.  Waitstaff was fantabulous as always.

This is by far the best restaurant in town! Friendly and responsive staff along with a soothing atmosphere! My girlfriend and I have come here a few times and always had an amazing experience. I would recommend the Salmon when you come here. Always made perfectly!

Amazing! My wife and I went here together for the first time and everything was absolutely delicious. Prices were a little high, but definitely worth it. Highly recommend checking this place out and I'm certain that we will be back again in the future!

Stopped on down to Mona Lisa's for a birthday dinner. The ambiance was classy but casual. The service was top notch.  The menu had a little bit of everything to offer. My friend and I got an appetizer and entree and desert, and hands down it was one of the best restaurant's I've been to. For the quality of food and service the price is well worth it.

As a business owner to another business, I would have to say I was disappointed in how we were treated. It should not matter what background, ethnicity or color you are. It doesnt matter if I wear a white coat, a suit or if I had holes in my shoes. People come to a great place to be treated better, to be served better, to try better things. Try taking in a little of my advice and remember that your actions reflect on your business. Thank you and have a great day.
Love this little gem! Just sat at the bar this time as I was alone.  Still great experience and really great food

How can fried dough taste so good?  Great staff.  Quick and friendly service!  Bring a bib or just don't care like everyone else.  There is so much powder sugar your gonna make, but nobody cares because it taste so good.  They have two lines one for take out one for eat in, the lines are long but move quickly.

Very delicious, both hot chocolate & coffee were perfect! You do seat yourself upon arrival, I recommend during busy times to just sit at a table that may still need to be cleaned if needed. Service comes fairly quickly & they cleaned our table & then took our order very kindly. It is cash only, so be prepared, I think the closest ATM was across the street. Overall, pleasant experience, however be prepared to wait during peak hours of the day. We went during a rainy evening & had little to no wait.

This is a requisite stop for New Orleans. We went very late at night but this place was still pretty active at midnight. Service at that time was very good, as soon as we sat down a waiter came and took our order. Food and drinks came within 5 minutes. I give the place 3 stars because while the beignets and coffee were very good, I didn't find them any different than any of the other places that offered them. However I still recommend coming for the experience and to see the world famous Cafe Du Monde.

Absolutely loved Cafe Du Monde. It's a huge tourist attraction so the wait can be long, however we visited for a morning brunch and got seated in just a few minutes. The Beignets are truly to die for! The hype is real! All that fluffy sugar goodness takes you straight to heaven!

Go to the original find an available seat  and be ready to order.  One of the few touristy things in life that meet expectations but then again its coffee and donuts.  However, both very good and the atmosphere is amazing.  Set close to the street if you can and enjoy the performers.
It was really good. better than Colorado springs McDonald's.. Everything was fresh thank you

The coke machine is always broken, service is crapy, and the wait is not worth the food. You could go somewhere for better food and get it faster. If you are in a rush go somewhere else, this place is not worth it. To top it all off it is not kid friendly anymore. They have electronic devices that don’t even work half the time. I went once and a baby got run over by a high chair. NOT kid friendly at all.
My weakness! Always a crowd but worth the wait. This location one of the cleanest for being so busy.
Wow looks really nice, so modern, good customer service and they have some good deals.

Nasty food..filthy restaurant .. I am so fed up with the sorry excuse for customer service. I came in today and ordered chicken nuggets, no dipping sauce but 2 packs of mayo, they charged me for the mayo, then tried to give me someone elses food. after they handed my food to the car in front of me, they gave me the same food without replacing it. This place is a horrible location. I will never go back to this location. The sad thing is the owners could care less.
Sunnyside is an amazing park, I was there for the Coca Cola Classic Disc Golf Tournament. Awesome weekend.
Loved the park with the rolling hills and trees. Had a wonderful firepit and frisbee golf
Nice relaxing place to picnic or just chill and listen to nature.
Nice quiet place to camp without the noise. Secluded and safe
Nice playground equipment, lots of shade trees, not much traffic. Nice place to have a picnic and play.
Good shashlik lunch

Еда офигенная. Персонал отличный. Место красивое, река рядом. Парковка. Детская площадка. The cuisine is  excellent, of Caucasian type. The service is fast. The place is beautiful, right at the river. Parking lot. Kids' grounds.
Some of meat is too dry or rough.
the BEST lamb I've ever eaten! much more delicious than Peter luger steak
Excellent kitchen, the food was delicious. Service is a little faster than Kazakhstan standards. Afterall you are out dining to enjoy yourself, this is not a drive-thru.
